{{Wireless embedded system |brand=OvisLink |model=N.MINI |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/30/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=WAP5502 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=travel router |fcc_id=MQ4WAP5502 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3235DM2I-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9812G6JH-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Dual High-efficiency PWM Step-down DC-DC Converter;BCD Semiconductor;AUR9706A; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.4.18;rsdk-96c; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=N.MINI |default_ssid_regex=^N.MINI$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=airlive |oui=00:4F:81 |oui_eth=00:4F:81 }} "M01-P5502-E10" (as well as a date code of '''1215''') is silkscreened on the board in the images below.. indicating this device is an [[AboCom WAP5502]]. :The FCC ID of the WAP5502 has been assigned to this entry.
==Board headers + etc== *J15 (between RJ45 and power plug) is likely the serial interface. *J11 is likely a 12-pin JTAG header.
The circuit board is prepared for an USB connector.
==Links== [http://www.airlive.com/product/N.MINI Product page] :[http://fs.airlive.com/manual/AirLive_N.MINI_SpecSheet.pdf Specifications] :[http://fs.airlive.com/manual/AirLive_N.MINI-QIG.pdf Quick Setup Guide] :[http://fs.airlive.com/manual/AirLive_N.MINI_Manual.pdf User's Manual] :[http://www.airlive.com/support/faq/N.MINI FAQ] :[http://fs.airlive.com/faq/How_to_use_N.MINI_to_extend_the_coverage%20of_my_wireless_network.pdf How to use N.MINI to extend the coverage of a wireless network] [http://www.airlive.com/support/firmware/N.MINI Firmware page] :[http://fs.airlive.com/firmware/N.MINI_v74.11.0.2.1e_b13_httpupgrade.rar Firmware v74.11.0.2.1e_b13] :[http://fs.airlive.com/firmware/N.MINI_v74.11.0.2.1e_b10_httpupgrade.zip Firmware v74.11.0.2.1e_b10] :[http://fs.airlive.com/firmware/Airlive_N.MINI_b9_httpupgrade.zip Firmware v74.11.0.2.1e_b9] :[http://fs.airlive.com/firmware/N.MINI_v74.11.0.2.1e_b7.zip Firmware v74.11.0.2.1e_b7] :[http://fs.airlive.com/GPL_Code/OVISLINK_NMINI_GPL.tgz GPL source (40.9MB)] [http://news.softpedia.com/news/How-to-Unbrick-Your-AirLive-N-Mini-Wireless-N-Router-199471.shtml How to unbrick your AirLive N.MINI]
